author: max, Arman0334
name: OnConnect
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. Use `[p]connectset channel` to set event channel. **Important note**, this cog support slash command, once you sync the tree it will show up under `/` on discord.
Feel free to check the docs <https://maxcogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/onconnect.html>
description: On connect is a shard event cog that shows on ready, disconnect and resume.
short: Shard events cog that shows on ready, disconnect and resume.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
